introduction: JOSH MALONE receives a letter from the private investigator hired by his estranged daughter to find him. She's gone missing. Josh travels to the Isle Tide Hotel to join the hunt, but soon discovers this is no ordinary lodging. Open every three years for three nights, a cult prepare for a bizarre ritual. A strange mix of colourful characters hiding personal traumas with one thread binding them. Their search for the meaning of life. Just as Josh closes in on his daughters location, the congregation switch bodies. No longer sure who he can trust, or who anyone is, the closing ceremony begins as Josh uncovers his daughter involvement in the cult.
